Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem (O'Hare)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (O'Hare) due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem (O'Hare) due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
